'''Secret Source Sentinels''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. 

They can act as Interactables, open-world puzzles, or special enemies,<ref name="OYHM">{{Ref/Quest|Open Your Heart to Me}}</ref> or be associated with other mechanisms (especially Secret Source platforms).

==Lore==
Secret Source Sentinels are a type of [[Secret Source Automaton]] that were created to monitor the people, serve as guards, and store records. They are capable of robust movement, can transport large objects, and have combat abilities (though limited). Their center disc can act as a simple display screen.
